items.title: The case for a U.S. bear market was building even before Trump antagonized overseas investors
items.description: There are two important measures that point to a downturn for stocks, according to Longview Economics.

items.title: Gold is approaching $5,000, and ‘unavoidable uncertainty’ means it could go higher
items.description: RBC’s head of commodities says there could be paths even higher for gold in a “real risk-off scenario.”

items.title: ‘It’s my money’: My $800K inheritance is paying for a $1.6 million house. Shouldn’t I decide where my husband and I live?
items.description: ‘My husband and I have been together for 25 years. We have two children’

items.title: Natural gas prices have overshot as deep freeze hits the U.S., says Goldman
items.description: Goldman Sachs thinks the current natural gas price reflects a temporary imbalance and should eventually correct.
